title: Crispy Pork Dumplings
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', 'hot water, as needed', '250g skinless and boneless pork belly', '2 tablespoons oil', 'fermented soybean paste to taste', 'ginger, finely chopped to taste', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '1-2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'ground white pepper to taste', 'chicken stock granules', 'oil, as needed for frying']
